settings.heading: Are there fluoride-free options among cruelty-free toothpaste?
settings.row_content: Boka toothpaste is completely fluoride-free and cruelty-free. We use a revolutionary material called nano-hydroxyapatite (n-Ha), which NASA first developed for astronauts. This power-packed ingredient makes up 97% of your tooth enamel and 70% of your dentin. Since it comprises the primary foundation of teeth and bones, it is naturally restorative for your teeth and enamel.

settings.heading: Why should I choose cruelty-free toothpaste?
settings.row_content: Choosing cruelty-free toothpaste supports ethical and humane practices. It ensures that no animals were harmed in the testing of the product, aligning with the values of many consumers.

settings.heading: Are all cruelty-free toothpastes vegan?
settings.row_content: Not necessarily. Cruelty-free toothpaste means the product wasn't tested on animals, but it doesn't guarantee it's vegan. Some toothpaste may still contain animal-derived ingredients. HOWEVER, Boka toothpastes are completely vegan and cruelty-free.

settings.heading: Can this toothpaste be as effective as traditional toothpaste?
settings.row_content: Yes, our cruelty-free toothpaste is just as effective as traditional options.

settings.heading: Do cruelty-free toothpastes cost more?
settings.row_content: These toothpastes are priced competitively with traditional options, so there is no extra cost.
